video.title: SamSam
video.synopsis: With the help of his flying saucer, magic cape and space ray, pint-sized superhero SamSam fights monsters and other bad guys.

episodes.synopsis: When SamSam lands in the desert, he is attacked by three Wettabeds. SweetPea wants to return to Planet Marth and SamSam goes along.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: SamSam collects magic cards that he doesn't want to share. SamSam doesn't dare say no to the dance performance of SuperJulie and SweetPea.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: SamSam thinks he was a frog at birth. He loses a tooth, which Beastly Beard steals. SamTeddy is gone and SamSam tries to find him.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Sweetpea and Muckyuck's birthdays are on the same day. SamSam believes that two of his friends came in disguise.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: SweetPea is in love with SuperJulie. SamSam is fooled and thinks his folks will adopt his friend. On Marth, SamSam falls in love with an animal.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: SamMummy and SamDaddy want to be together one evening. SamSam meets a mute monster, and no one joins Marthial for his birthday.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: SamSam dreams of marrying his teacher. SamSam's parents go camping and Muckyuck is very proud to have made friends at last.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: It's a bother to find a game everyone likes. Mom's cleaning up and SamSam has one of the worst days of his life.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: SamSam and SamTeddy get lost in space. Muckyuck invites SuperJulie to tea and SamMummy threw away a toy of SamSam's.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: SamSam is made to believe that Beastly Beard is his dad. Kiki steals gold. Beastly Beard escapes SamSam and falls into a black hole.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: SamMummy and SamDaddy found a baby-sitter. At SamSam's birthday party, there is an unexpected guest. After an accident, SamSam's shadow is released.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: How embarrassing when your parents come to school to bring you your snack. SamSpoker is kidnapped and SuperJulie doubts SamSam's powers.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: SamMummy's saucer breaks down. SweetPea competes in the Big Competition of SamPlanet. SamSam damages the whale spaceship.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: SamSam convinces King Marthial to be nicer to his people. SamTeddy leaves and the house rebels because they're mad with SamMummy.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: SamSam wants to impress SuperJulie. SamSam panics, for SamTeddy has stopped talking and moving. SamSam is a stowaway in his dad's rocket.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: SamSam discovers that the Marth residents dump their trash. SamSam wants to impress SuperJulie. SamSam takes over his dad's work.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The kids learn about space storms and SuperJulie gets kidnapped. Muckyuck is hired as a pirate.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: SamSam and his dad go to a botanical garden. SamSam goes looking for Pop Stars but ends up feeling sick.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: SamSam wants to give his mom a heart-shaped rock. SamSam and Super Julie can't pick a winner, and SamSam is worried about Mega Gino.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Marthial can't stand the laughter of SamSam and his friends. SweetPea is caught by Marthial, and a treasure is near.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: SamSam rams into the control box that monitors the space traffic lights on PlanetSam! Sam Planet celebrates and everything looks red.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: SamDaddy must test a multiplier for cosmic heroes. SamSam, Super Julie, and SweetPea prepare a concert, and it's raining rocks.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: SamSam spends a day with Mr. George, SamDaddy's boss. To seduce a lady monster, Muckyuck has to get rid of his YuckYucks, and there is a new teacher.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: SamSam finds a box with one button! Marthial fears a comet crashing into his planet! SweetPea steals to attract SuperJulie.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: SamSam wants to fetch his first cosmic star. SamSam has to take care of his cousin. Today there are cards on the Card Tree.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: On a trip with SweetPea, SamSam helps a Sam resident. Marthial puts in a pipe to quench his thirst and Beastly Beard has a unique ring.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: SamDaddy lost the earring he wanted to give to SamMummy. The teacher has a new tool, and SamSam and Muckyuck changed skins!
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: SamSam thinks his friends are mad with him. Marthial stole the satellite antenna! SamSam is influenced by the Excitators!
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Beastly Beard has hypnotic dance music! At "Star Idol" you can win a space ship, and Marthial kidnaps a famous cook.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: SamSam tries to find the robot that SamDaddy had as a child. Beastly Beard has the automatic scanno-vision detector, and SamSam gives Muckyuck a hand.
episodes.title: SamSam: Episode 30
